item.title: Article Curator for Kindle
item.description: Another short one. I noticed I mostly use my mobile data to read articles suggested by Google Chrome.

item.title: Scarcity in an Ocean of Knowledge
item.description: I wrote down the three things I wanted to work on today; one being a blog post on how I automated adding content to the blog that you’re currently reading.
